text: André Mba Obame (15 June 1957Page for Mba Obame at UNESCO website ."MBA OBAME André", GABON: LES HOMMES DE POUVOIR N°4, Africa Intelligence, 5 March 2002 . - 12 April 2015) was a Gabonese politician. After serving as an adviser to President Omar Bongo in the 1980s, he was a minister in the government of Gabon from 1990 to 1991 and again from 1997 to 2009. Obame died in Yaoundé, Cameroon, on 12 April 2015 from a long-illness, aged 57.Dorian Ondo, "L'opposant André Mba Obame n'est plus", Gabonews, 12 April 2015 . ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Gabonese politicians
title: André Mba Obame
